page.title: 16THE DAIRY
page.content:
Basildon dairy is on the Wantage to Oxford road, next door to Elm Farm.They employ about 100 people.At this dairy they make cream and yogurt. The large tankers arrive everyday with the milk which is then made into cream and yogurt. Fruit is then added to the yogurt which is pumped into a machine which has the cups and lids waiting for the yogurts, when the yogurts has been pumped into the cups the machine moves the cups on to have the lids put on and heat sealed and then the sell by date stamped on.The finished yogurt pots are then packed into a box of 12 and sent the cold store which is then sent out to the shops.
By Sharon Kelly and Amanda
